name: Soul Survivor (itch) (Travanator)
description:
*PRESS TESTING RESET BEFORE STARTING*

I hate to add that above but there was a last-minute bug that gave you a bunch of souls at the start and I didn't have time to fix, this is coming in hot hahaa

Pressing Testing reset will reset your skills and souls basically loading a new save file.

Summary:

Play as a Lich defending yourself against waves of the oncoming raid.

Collect their souls to unlock and upgrade your stats and abilities.

There's a boss wave every 2 minutes for the first 20 mins then endless waves after that.

Controls:

WASD to Move

Aim with your mouse

No controller support atm

Credits:

Game was made by me Travis Harris :)
